scripts.deploy-confirmation: sh -ec 'OUT=$(wrangler whoami 2>&1); if echo "$OUT" | grep -q "not authenticated"; then printf "⚠ You are not logged in to wrangler. Do you want to login now ? (yes/no): "; read LOGIN; if [ "$LOGIN" = "yes" ]; then wrangler login && wrangler whoami || { echo "Login failed."; exit 1; }; else echo "Login Cancelled."; exit 1; fi; else echo "$OUT"; fi; echo "⟢ Deploying Project Name: $npm_package_name"; printf "⌲ Proceed With Deployment? (yes/no): "; read CONFIRM; [ "$CONFIRM" = "yes" ] || (echo "Deployment Cancelled." && exit 1)'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy ./public --project-name=$npm_package_name
